title: Champion shard re rolling
body: If you re roll 3 champion shards are you guaranteed to get a champion you don't own, as i have all champions, would it make sense if I re rolled once a new champion came out (Kled) that I would get him for a lot less ip, not that I need to save on ip just wondering

replies.body:
yes.

I had all the champions. rerolled and got Taliyah when she came out.

Basically buying 3 champ shards would be better than buying new champs when they come out for people who own them all
That being said, they may have changed it after adding champion shards (since im pretty sure Taliyah was pre IP Champ Shards)
